Description:
Rosedale Retirement Village
Located a short stroll to Lansell Square shopping centre this secure home has all the mod cons and the bonus of an additional space that could be a study, sewing room or second lounge ( a rare find at a great price ). Entering from the front porch you are greeted with a large open plan lounge/dining area that adjoins the kitchen with good storage space, dishwasher & full cooking facilities. Both bedrooms have built in robes and ceiling fans, close by is the bathroom that features a large shower, vanity & toilet. With undercover parking for a car and a smartly built in garden shed there is room for additional storage of those bulky items. To inspect the property please contact Nathan Diss on 0448010057.
Insights: 24 other 2 bedroom unit in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Homely Haven on Howell
In a lovely elevated position, 40 Howell Crescent offers a well maintained 3-bedroom home on a manageable 658sqm allotment among other desirable homes in a fantastic location.
This property is suitable for a broad range of buyers - families, investors, first home buyers and retirees. Enjoy the accessibility of being within walking distance to schools, childcare, public transport, sporting complexes, parks and entertainment.
Upon arrival you'll notice the neat and easy care front garden with established trees, full garden beds and pebbles in-lieu of lawn to reduce mowing.
The main living room is light filled; capturing the morning sun and is quite a good size. It leads through to the open plan kitchen, meals and small family area. The kitchen offers a 4-burner gas cooktop, electric wall oven and grill, pantry and a breakfast bar. This space has two sliding doors - one leads to the carport and the other to the entertainment deck.
An ensuite, large built-in robe and a ceiling fan are features of the main bedroom. The 3-piece family bathroom and adjoining toilet are conveniently located near the remaining 2 bedrooms, which both have built-in robes. The laundry has external access with a concrete path that leads straight to the clothesline.
There is ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling to keep the temperature comfortable year-round. Most of the windows have canvas awnings, which assists in keeping the house cooler in the summer months.
The double carport has a gate to close the cars in - also handy for keeping kids and pets safely enclosed in the yard. The timber entertainment deck offers a lovely spot to sit and take in the views. The gardens have been cared for over the years and contain fruit trees, flowering trees and a spot to plant seasonal veggies. The 4m x 4m shed has a concrete floor, power and lights and there's also a handy 2m x 2m garden shed.
The position of this property is perfect - a lovely area on the Melbourne side of Bendigo. Inspections are most welcome so call today to arrange a viewing.
NOTE: All enquiries must include a contact phone number.
Insights: 40 Howell Crescent, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
THE IDEAL TOWNHOUSE- IN A VERY CONVENIENT LOCATION
Located only a short stroll to Central Lansell shopping centre, very close to public transport. This town house is as convenient as they come.
Stylish and immaculately presented three bedrooms, this six year old property has been kept in pristine condition for an astute investor, or for the enjoyment of an owner- occupier.
Both heating and cooling are catered for with ducted heating and evaporative cooling and there is a gas assisted solar system hot water service. The house is spacious and open plan with ceiling fan in the lounge direct outdoor access from the tiled dining area, an excellent kitchen with great breakfast bar and bench space, under-bench electric fan forced oven, gas hot plates, rangehood and dishwasher. The master bedroom has a ceiling fan, twin windows, built in robes and an attractive full ensuite bathroom.
Two further large bedrooms with built-in robes and ceiling fans, are serviced by the main bathroom containing a bath, shower recess and vanity with the toilet separate.
The nearby smart laundry has a large trough. This property has a single carport, gated to the fully fenced easy to maintain rear yard with covered entertainment area and a small garden or storage shed.
A great lock up and leave low maintenance property! Call to inspect now! It won't last long.

Description:
A place to call home
This beautiful Federation style home is situated at the end of a quiet court in sought after Kangaroo Flat.
From the moment you step inside the warmth and charm will impress with features such as a bay window, decorative cornices and high ceilings.
Comprising of 3 large bedrooms plus a study. The main bedroom has a walk-in robe and ensuite while the others all have built in robes.
A formal lounge at the front overlooks the tree lined court and flows through to the large light filled family area at the rear of the home, which incorporating an excellent kitchen with loads of cupboards, quality appliances and a dishwasher.
The family/meals area looks out over a fabulous patio and rear yard with established trees making it an ideal place to relax.
Other features include ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating for year-round comfort, direct entry to home via the double lock up garage with remote door. Low maintenance gardens. A 6x5 shed with concrete floor and power.
Situated on a good size block with a private and fully enclosed yard and only minutes away from all Kangaroo Flat amenities. This property is sure to please a variety of buyers.

Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE & MODERN
This contemporary home offers a low maintenance lifestyle in a fabulous new-home location. With architectural appeal the home is ideal for downsizers, professionals and first home buyers alike. Designed for those who love to entertain the home boasts 3 generous sized bedrooms plus a study. The master bedroom has a sizeable walk through robe that leads into the modern ensuite consisting of an oversized shower, vanity and toilet. The remaining bedrooms all with built in robes.
Gas ducted heating as well as ducted evaporative cooling ensure comfortable climate during hot summers and cold winters. A stylish kitchen includes quality cabinetry, a generous pantry, stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop, electric oven and double sink and overlooks the main living area and external living zone.
Cleverly designed the rear living, kitchen and dining area flows seamlessly out to the decked alfresco – ideal for entertaining. All neatly plastered under roof line with downlights it really heightens the appeal and can be used all year round.

Description:
Are you sick of city living and craving the country lifestyle?
This beautiful large country block of 2251m2 has elevated views and is located less than five minutes to the Bendigo CBD and a short walk to the local train station. A very picturesque block it is ideal for building your new family home with plenty of space for the children to run and play. Or perhaps some chickens, pets or home grown vegetables.The block has a cleared area ideal for building whilst retaining some of the natural vegetation to retain that picturesque rural look. Part of the block includes natural vegetation and beautiful wattles.
In terms of services all are close by and available to this block with low density residential zoning which Council allow to be built on. Securing a half acre allotment in this area is indeed a rare opportunity.
Close to all amenities, the Kangaroo Flat Railway station is within walking distance (250 metres) and the regular trains to Melbourne take approximately 90 minutes. Nearby is a great primary school (600 metres) and a large shopping centre to meet all a families needs.
In summary this outstanding block offers the following and more:-
*Fabulous corner building block of 2251m2 close to all amenities
*Beautiful elevated site with rural setting and walk to train station and shops
*Nicely treed but cleared area for nice building site saving $$$
*A very rare find in such close proximity to all amenities
*Zoned low density residential and all services available
*Perfect for building your new home with large shed/workshop
*Kangaroo Flat is only a five minute drive to Bendigo CBD
*Close to schools, shops, supermarkets, shopping centres
*Only 250 metres to the Kangaroo Flat railway station - express train journey to Melbourne is 90 minutes
*Only 600 metres to a great primary school and 2km to a major shopping centre
*Lovely Wattles and natural vegetation surround the building area
*Ideal for the tradie wanting to build a home and large workshop
*All services are close by or available for this low density residential block
Property Code: 122

Description:
Are you sick of city living and craving the country lifestyle?
This beautiful large country block of 2251m2 has elevated views and is located less than five minutes to the Bendigo CBD and a short walk to the local train station. A very picturesque block it is ideal for building your new family home with plenty of space for the children to run and play. Or perhaps some chickens, pets or home grown vegetables.The block has a cleared area ideal for building whilst retaining some of the natural vegetation to retain that picturesque rural look. Part of the block includes natural vegetation and beautiful wattles.
In terms of services all are close by and available to this block with low density residential zoning which Council allow to be built on. Securing a half acre allotment in this area is indeed a rare opportunity.
Close to all amenities, the Kangaroo Flat Railway station is within walking distance (250 metres) and the regular trains to Melbourne take approximately 90 minutes. Nearby is a great primary school (600 metres) and a large shopping centre to meet all a families needs.
In summary this outstanding block offers the following and more:-
*Fabulous corner building block of 2251m2 close to all amenities
*Beautiful elevated site with rural setting and walk to train station and shops
*Nicely treed but cleared area for nice building site saving $$$
*A very rare find in such close proximity to all amenities
*Zoned low density residential and all services available
*Perfect for building your new home with large shed/workshop
*Kangaroo Flat is only a five minute drive to Bendigo CBD
*Close to schools, shops, supermarkets, shopping centres
*Only 250 metres to the Kangaroo Flat railway station - express train journey to Melbourne is 90 minutes
*Only 600 metres to a great primary school and 2km to a major shopping centre
*Lovely Wattles and natural vegetation surround the building area
*Ideal for the tradie wanting to build a home and large workshop
*All services are close by or available for this low density residential block
Property Code: 122

Description:
TWO HOMES ONE TITLE
TWO HOMES ONE TITLE
– Ideal for Extended Family
Coming to the market for the first time in 55 years this special property has beautiful garden setting, so much to offer, options are endless. Situated in a lovely tree lined setting, placed perfectly to the block with separate access and services (gas, power, and NBN to each property) The 1960s Cream Brick house is in good condition with original features, the imagination runs wild with what can be done here. Comprising 3 bedrooms; large rumpus/family room, large windows, great views of the garden, separate lounge/living room and galley kitchen; hardwood floors throughout; gas heating; split system air conditioner and evaporative cooler/gas cooking and hot water. Two single garages with roller doors, single carport; also a workshop & garden sun room and small shed, lots of character!
The second home is a weatherboard cottage style, 2 good size bedrooms with BIRs; lots of cupboard space. Features open plan, full timber kitchen and large living room/ gas heating and split system air conditioner; gas cooking and hot water. Bathroom / laundry has a bath & separate shower. Single carport and garden Shed. This property is surrounded by a manicured garden going all the way down to the walking track, very pretty.
There is also potential for dual occupancy, rental or subdivision STCA.
This is a great location being close to schools, Lansel Square shopping complex and supermarkets. This is a fantastic opportunity, homes like this do not come around very often
The land alone is a fantastic piece of natural ambiance with beautiful bird life
This home has been much loved over the years. Situated on a large piece of land the original cream brick home has all the upticks for a solid home in all aspects .
Potential plus comes to mind with the growth of further infrastructure to the area. This property is only a short distance to Lancsell Square
Contact Rod now for inspection and more details
* Land area is approximate only.

Description:
Ideal Location For The Family
Set on over 765m2
is this fantastic opportunity as a first home, family home or addition to any investment portfolio. Featuring three bedrooms, evaporative aircon, Log gas heating, a connected kitchen, dining and main living space with an open rumpus room for the kids to enjoy.
Another great aspect of this property is its close proximity to thriving shopping precinct including Aldi, IGA, Bakery, Chemists, Chinese restaurants, 2 pubs, butcher and so much more. A family home indeed with schools in walking distance, sporting clubs. There is ample space in the back yard for the kids to hang out with friends, or for the family to enjoy a lovely weekend BBQ, a lovely sitting area to read a book, and a lush green fernery to potter around in.
This property has a large enclosed
yard with rear access, a garden shed and garage for 1 car or a workshop and plenty of space to store a caravan or trailer. Tastefully renovated, this property is a must see!
-Great location
-3 bedrooms
-Updated kitchen and bathroom
-Ambient gas log fire
-Rear access for caravan or trailer
-Garden shed and workshop
-Set on 765 m2

Description:
Family-friendly location in Kangaroo Flat
This well-presented three bedroom brick home could have everything you've been looking for.
The spacious open-plan kitchen/living area features a lovely white modern kitchen with stainless-steel wall oven and gas cooktop.
The three good sized bedrooms include a master with walk-in robe, serviced by the dual-access 3 piece bathroom, and two other bedrooms with built-in robes.
The home has neutral tones throughout, with split-system heating/cooling to keep you comfortable all year round.
The level, well-landscaped yard with low maintenance gardens will leave you plenty of time to enjoy the undercover alfresco.
Double garage with remote door and drive through access.
In an area that is more popular than ever, this home is ideal for first home buyers, retirees and investors, and is conveniently located close to all Kangaroo Flat amenities, schools and public transport.

Description:
Meets All The Family Needs In Comfort And Style
Situated in a quiet newly developed estate in Kangaroo Flat is this lovely and grand family residence that will meet all of your needs.
Be greeted by spacious, light-filled entrance in which you'll find a sizeable front sitting room/ second living room adjacent to the main bedroom with all the luxuries including an ensuite with a double vanity, walk-in robe plus three lovely big windows allowing gorgeous sunlight to stream through the room.
Step into the hallway that leads to the central gourmet kitchen and meals area. This well-thought-out design includes a walk-in pantry that opens up into the lock-up garage, so you can straight away put your groceries in the pantry without having to lug your heavy shopping bags through the house. In addition to this, you'll find quality s/s appliances such a 900mm gas cooktop/oven, range hood and dishwasher plus a wide breakfast island and plenty of bench space.
Sliding doors open up from the kitchen to the impressive large outdoor alfresco which includes Spanline pergola with high-quality zip track blinds giving you an all-year-round perfect entertaining area. Through the blinds is the low maintenance spacious backyard to let your kids run free in the safety of their own backyard.
Offering split living you'll find the other three generously proportioned bedrooms all with built in robes, with their own spacious central bathroom, linen room and large laundry.
Other features include ducted heating and cooling throughout plus a split system in the main lounge room, side access, fully landscaped front and backyards just to name a few.
Amazing location just a short distance to quality schools, child care, health facilities, Lansell Square shopping centre, well-maintained parklands, buses and train stations. Plus you're on the Melbourne side of Bendigo meaning you can just jump straight on the Calder highway and be in the city within 1.5 hours.
This home is ideal for both first home owners and investors so don't miss your opportunity to inspect this brilliant property today. Enquiries welcomed.

Description:
WONDERFUL FRESH LOOK
This pristine property should attract a broad range of buyers. Distinguished by a portico entrance and super contemporary appearance, the interior is just as smart and streamlined.
With three bedrooms, it will appeal to a young family, down-sizers or buyers on the hunt for an easy to maintain investment. All three bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and the three-piece bathroom has a large bath. The open-plan living area includes a carpeted living room and tiled kitchen and dining room. The state of- the art kitchen has a great pantry, bench top and stainless steel dishwater and stove. The living area has access to the gorgeous landscaped
garden which opens up the home beautifully.
There is that intangible quality you look for in any home - a lovely open and fresh atmosphere which will lift your spirits when you step in the door. Other features include a rear patio which runs the length of the house; access for a caravan or trailer and internal access from the garage which will reassure the security conscious. Located in a great position in Kangaroo Flat, handy to the train station and Lansell Square and not too far from Crusoe Reservoir if a bracing walk is your thing.

Description:
NOT SHORT ON CHARM!
We are delighted to present this well-loved family home to the market which is in immaculate condition. This timeless brick veneer sits proudly amongst the low maintenance, manicured gardens set on a quiet street. Park the car in style through the automatic gates leading to a double carport adjoined to a large shed with automatic roller door. The living room provides a calming space, ducted heating and cooling throughout provides year round comfort. Three generous sized bedrooms set this house apart from others. Saving the best until last! A fantastic renovation to the kitchen, bathroom and laundry is the true focal point to this wonderful home which brings it to a modern standard of living. The kitchen/dining area is special, a perfect display of quality and functionality an inspection is sure to impress.

Description:
CONVENIENT AND QUIET LOCATION
Perfectly positioned within walking distance to the shops of Kangaroo Flat along with a walking track, bowling club, and sports club nearby. The property offers two bedrooms, both with BIR's, spacious lounge, kitchen/dining area, three piece bathroom and laundry with great storage. This low maintenance home has been lovingly maintained throughout with gas heating and a split system maintaining temperatures all year round. A great place to invest with a current tenant in place who would love the option to stay while also being a perfect downsizing option.
Note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT INSPECTIONS

Description:
Ideal first, last or investment townhouse.
Easily maintained townhouse is an ideal choice for your first or last home.
Designed with comfort and convenience in mind, it offers three robed bedrooms or two bedrooms and a study with bi-fold doors opening off the living area.
There are two living areas, each with a split system unit for year-round comfort plus well-appointed kitchen and open meals/living area flowing seamlessly to a covered decked alfresco bringing the outdoors in and providing the ideal place to relax with family and friends.
Single carport and easy-care landscaping plus perfectly positioned a few minutes from shops, schools, childcare facilities and public transport.
Whether you're searching for a first home, looking to retire or secure a brilliant ready made investment property, this one ticks all the boxes.
Currently leased at $295.00 per week.
